attributes.action: use all means at his disposal to ensure that capital punshment is NEVER brought back into the country's judicial system; even if it starts to be allowed by the E.U.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Capital punishment is a barbaric way of dealing with crime; it brings the judiciary down to the level of the criminal (what is the moral difference between killing for "justice" and killing for whatever motive individual killers may have?).  It doesn't change the fact that the crime has been committed, or the effect on the victim's loved ones, and is obviously done only for revenge.  It has NO "deterrent" effect; otherwise areas of the U.S., and other countries, which practise it would be crime-free instead of which we occasionally learn of a specific U.S. state having executed its 1000th prisoner.  Capital punishment has no place in a civilised country; or, indeed, any country.
